personal.title: Design Technologist
personal.longStatement:
I bring a wealth of experience and passion for user experience design, ready to make valuable contributions to a dynamic design or sales enablement team. My unique blend of coding proficiency, tech comprehension, and empathetic customer-centric approach sets me apart, offering a valuable perspective for any organization.

I am actively exploring opportunities that allow me to navigate the dynamic convergence of design and technology. Keen on both expanding my skill set and sharing my knowledge with less experienced colleagues, I am driven by curiosity and captivated by the challenges and innovations within the AI/ML and fintech realms.

My goal is to channel my revitalized passion and extensive experience into a collaborative and growing team, making a meaningful impact and driving success. I look forward to contributing my expertise to a forward-thinking organization that values the intersection of design and technology.

My unique blend of coding proficiency, tech comprehension, and empathetic customer-centric approach sets me apart, offering a valuable perspective for any organization.
